title: The Healthy Life Company
description: Natural food store selling a wide range of unrefined and organic whole foods including ingredients for cooking, baking, home brewing, items for special diets, yeast-free traditional artisan breads in addition to beauty products, toiletries, and supplements. Next door is The Bistro & Cookery School, a small evening restaurant that offers vegan options on a mainly meat menu, phone 01380-720043, hours Tue-Sat 11am-2pm and 7-late.
